::Cerberus::

    "None," He lied, very belivably. "None, what so ever."
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2000 1:18 AM
  Subject: Re: Demolition=



  ::Zardus::

  Zardus nods. Magmatron sounded like a wise leader. "Hmm.=
. So you have 
  no idea on what this new technology might be?"

  He recie=
ves Wheeljack's report. Setting his comm-link to silent 
  (Cerebrus wouldn=
't hear him reply), he replies. "Excellent. Can you 
  make them transmit i=
n a columb, meeting with the edges of the Iron 
  Fist's shields above wate=
r, and with the sea bottom on the bottom?"




  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com,=
 "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
  > ::Cerberus::
  > 
  >     This was=
 his chance to make Magmatron look bad. "He is 
  developing new technology=
, I don't have access to it, I am not 'high 
  enough in command' as he put=
 it, although I am second in command."


        eGroups Sponsor
